articles.title: Coronavirus spreads to a previously healthy sector: corporate earnings
articles.description: From Apple to Coca-Cola, here are the big companies revising earnings outlooks due to coronavirus.

articles.author: Sy Mukherjee
articles.title: Pharma vet and former Biogen chief to lead biotech industry’s coronavirus response
articles.description: George Scangos, now the CEO of Vir, will coordinate the biotech industry's coronavirus response.

articles.author: Chris Morris
articles.title: Demands to cancel SXSW grow amid coronavirus fears as organizers tout new guests
articles.description: Organizers prefer to focus on Hillary Clinton’s appearance, rather than coronavirus and a 17,000+ person petition.

articles.title: The coronavirus is giving China cover to expand its surveillance. What happens when the virus is gone?
articles.description: Improved facial recognition tech and mandatory registrations track potential coronavirus carriers.

articles.title: Coronavirus is threatening a manufacturing comeback in the Eurozone
articles.description: The virus is hitting delivery lead times and inventories in the bloc

articles.author: James Nosek
articles.title: Japanese electronics maker Sharp will start making face masks to meet coronavirus demand
articles.description: Electronics maker Sharp Corp. said Monday it will start making surgical masks, which are in high demand because of the virus outbreak

articles.author: James Nosek
articles.title: Dow surges 5% on hopes for central bank help on the economy
articles.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average surged more than 1,200 points, or 5%, on hopes that central banks will take action to shelter the global economy from the effects of the coronavirus outbreak.

articles.title: Coronavirus stock market slide hits pause as another central bank promises ‘appropriate’ actions
articles.description: Investors are putting their faith in central banks—again

articles.author: lbelanger225
articles.title: Coronavirus concerns push baseball’s final Olympic qualifying event to June
articles.description: The World Baseball Softball Conference announced Monday the qualification event scheduled for April 1-5 had been postponed to June 17-21.
